Rapid Tender | Junior Frontend Developer | London, UK | Full-time, ONSITE, www.countfire.com (www.rapidtender.com)

If you are a super inquisitive, enthusiastic junior developer with an eye for the frontend, we'd like to speak to you about becoming the 3rd dev on our team.

We (Rapid Tender) make software (Countfire) for the construction industry. I know, enterprise software doesn't sound exciting but we do really interesting work. The technology you will learn includes (but is not limited to); js, react, mobx, angular, css, python, flask, sql, postgres and linux.

You will be given all the support you need to progress rapidly to an experienced developer. My expectation is that what you're missing in experience, you will make up for in a desire to learn.

Email aidan@rapidtender.com for more details (no recruiters please)
